# 5. Snakemake Tutorial

Snakemake is one of the most used workflow managers, during this section we will learn the basics. For this purpose, we are going to do review some of the (material)[http://slides.com/johanneskoester/snakemake-talk-40min#/] recently presented by Johannes Koester last month at University of Cambirdge. Then we are going follow (short tutorial)[https://snakemake.readthedocs.io/en/stable/tutorial/short.html] to learn the basics concepts of SnakeMake.
